availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Hamilton (Bracken County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Sarah Hamilton. Father of Charles W. Hamilton, David B. Hamilton, John L. Hamilton, Oscar Hamilton, Mary Hamilton, Amanda Hamilton, and Joshua B. Hamilton. Married to Avarilla Owens on January 6, 1859. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, p. 409B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Eastern District, p. 31.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, File # 000344094, Bracken County, January 6, 1859 (accessed on ancestry.com).
